dialogue:
The one who was always smiling at me must be the [color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color], like
the gatekeeper said. I can remember him more and more, just by
standing near the portal.

My chest grows warm if I think about him. I don't believe that
he'd willingly do all of this, but... what do I actually know about
him for sure?
He's a good person, I know he is.

He's always been nice to me, and he's loved writing new stories
and reading books. I would spend hours listening to him read
aloud.

When I'd have nightmares... I remember he'd read me to sleep.
It was the only thing that would calm me down.
